evidence.claim: Wedgewood Communications utilizes AWS for cloud hosting solutions.
The company mentions compliance with HIPAA and integration of health technologies like HL7 and FHIR.
They provide RESTful APIs for interoperable communications in health tech.
Wedgewood uses EDI and X12 transaction sets to streamline healthcare data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Wedgewood Communications engages in health tech with a focus on X12 transactions.
